definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The glow of a funeral pyre slowly dies by the silent river.
sentences.chinese: 火葬灰中的红光在沉静的河边慢慢地熄灭下去。

sentences.english: Four new crematory are commissioned at the fu shan crematorium.
sentences.chinese: 富山火葬场四个新火化炉投入服务。

sentences.english: Custom and religion limit the use of cremation in many places.
sentences.chinese: 在很多地方，习俗和宗教限制了对火葬的使用。

sentences.english: New cremators commissioned at the Fu Shan Crematorium.
sentences.chinese: 富山火葬场新火化炉投入服务。

sentences.english: He wants to be cremated, not buried.
Instead, he said, there would be a mass cremation on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 他说，会在周六采用一个集体火葬的方式。

sentences.english: Decommission the existing crematorium after the satisfactory commissioning of the new one.
sentences.chinese: 在新火化炉顺利运作后，拆卸现有的火葬场。

sentences.english: The office is in behind of crematory( Sifang Dashan).
sentences.chinese: 活动办公室在火葬场后面。

sentences.english: The access road adjacent to the diamond hill funeral parlour leading to sze chen hall of diamond hill crematorium.
sentences.chinese: 毗连钻石山殡仪馆，通往钻石山火葬场思亲堂的通路。

sentences.english: Improved crematoria with ventilation systems and smokestacks took shape.
sentences.chinese: 改进对通风系统和烟囱形成了火葬场。
他搭建了一个巨大的火葬柴堆。

sentences.english: Then I should be an ancient Hindu, and burn myself on your pyre.
sentences.chinese: 那么我就作一个古印度人，在你的火葬堆上自焚。

sentences.english: Choi's remains true today for cremation.
sentences.chinese: 崔真实的遗体今天进行火葬。

sentences.english: The cremation ghats in Varanasi burn day and night.
sentences.chinese: 在恒河边火葬日夜不息。

sentences.english: She is surrounded by jackals and other unholy creatures, the denizens of the cremation ground.
sentences.chinese: 她被豺狼和其他不神圣的人围绕着，那是火葬场的人。

definition: burial of cremated remains at the foot of a tree
buried and at rest (idiom); Resquiescat in pacem (RIP)
posthumous or ghost marriage (in which at least one of the bride and groom is dead)
